Hi all,

I downloaded 2010 Feb version and installed on my computer. I have Windows 7 64bit, VS2010.

I am building a WFP project and I referencec all DLL files found under WPF Toolkit folder, when I launch the application in debug mode I got exception message: "Could not load file or assembly 'WPFToolkit, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified".

After some search I saw some people talked about add these DLL to GAC, but I don't want this. Is there a way I can load WPF toolkit WITHOUT GAC? Because I need to distribute the desktop application to uses without WPF Toolkit installed, I would like to reference to local DLL files instead.

Thanks

Hardy
